ad_text: Tampa General Hospital Sponsored Tampa General Hospital ’s Acute Care Rotation Program (ACRP) is accepting applications! This 1-year program gives Registered Nurses the opportunity to work in a diverse range of units and gain well-rounded clinical experience with the full support of a program manager. Participating units include Primary Care, Cardiac, Oncology, Neurosciences, Transplant, Trauma, and more. The program begins February 6th, 2023 and is a full-time position with benefits. ACRP participants must have an accredited nursing degree and be able to obtain their Registered Nurse licensure in the State of Florida. Previous acute care experience is not required. Click below to apply! #WeAreTGH TGH.TALEO.NET Now Seeking RNs for Acute Care Rotation Program. Apply now

Tampa General Hospital Sponsored Tampa Bay's #1 hospital is offering a new, flexible way to nurse! Tampa General Hospital is now offering 12-week nursing contracts with significantly higher base pay than typical employment models. Candidates will enjoy the benefits of working with an American Nurses Credentialing Center Magnet-designated team with generous shift differentials and more! #WeAreTGH
